attributes.additional_details:
Winner of Wimbledon,
He helped to win then the Davis Cup for Britain
He won the Olympics
He has won countless Grand Slams
He is at present raising money to stamp out Malaria
He has support Wildlife Projects
He has been involved with UNISEF 
This list goes on and there is not enough room to fill it all
References are  The People of Britain, and the record books
attributes.background: Andrew Murray has achieved so much in his Career. His is an amazing ambassador for this Country. He support many Charitable Charities, both Nationally & Internationally. He is by far one of our all time greats in the field of Sport. He is the Greatest Tennis Player this Country has ever seen.
